channel.title: Arm & Hands – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Scratch Protection Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This sleeve is designed for medical practitioners caring for patients with a history of violence. Double layering protects the wearer from scratches targeting the forearms, allowing them to attend to their patient free of harm.

The post Scratch Protection Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Formfitting design keeps the sleeves firmly in place
  • Double layers protect from biting & scratching
  • Available for the forearm or forearm and hand for additional protection

The post Scratch Protection Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Thumb Lock with Wrist Support
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Immobilizes thumb and base of thumb to allow other fingers to move freely
  • Made of the finest tension elastic fabrics
  • Designed for comfortable positioning for sprains and strains
  • Lightweight and adjustable for custom fit
  • One size - Adjustable

The post Thumb Lock with Wrist Support appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Thumb Lock with Wrist Support appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Mighty Grip
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
These silicone discs are designed to be just flexible enough to exercise your grip. Choose between soft or hard depending on ability & desired grip strength.

  • Aids in the healing of injured wrists
  • Made of power elastic for total support
  • One size fits all, ideal for work or sports
  • Easily adjusted, convenient

The post Mighty Grip appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Mighty Grip appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical’s Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow will reduce soreness and minimize the danger of further injury.

Whether suffering from Tennis Elbow (Lateral Epicondylitis), Golf Elbow (Medial Epicondylitis), Forearm Tendonitis, Arthritis, Cubital Tunnel or Ulnar Nerve pain, Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or pain resulting from Arm Hyperextension, our elbow brace has been aiding people with muscle strain for 40 years.

The post Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Provides adjustable, stabilizing protection, relief, and compression
  • Adjustable, velcro-backed tendon pad cushions place gentle pressure where & when you need it
  • Fasteners are adjustable for best fit
  • Fits both left and right elbows
  • Gel compression pad can be chilled for additional pain relief & recovery
Forearm Size Brace Size
12.5″ – 15″ Small
15″ – 17″ Medium
17″ – 20.5″ Large

The post Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Arm Sleeves deliver performance enhancing compression to the front and back of the arms to increase blood circulation and provide muscle support during athletic training and recovery. The sleeves feature seamless gradient compression which provides wide ribbing in the front for bicep support and tight ribbing in the back and lower arm for triceps and forearm support.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The compression sleeve fabric is breathable and moisture wicking, allowing the garment and athlete to stay cool, dry and light during exertion. Developed by a professional athletic trainer, the compression leg sleeves are ideal for runners, cyclists, triathletes, and anyone else who is on their feet and would like to increase the blood flow to their arms.

  • Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • A great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use. Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Pulls moisture from your skin, dries quickly and helps regulates skin temperature. Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action.

  • Learn more about the benefits of compression.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Lined Digital Finger & Toe Caps
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Soft, comfortable, stretchable fabric tubing that is fully lined with a moisturizing gel interior that comforts and cushions sensitive corns, warts, blisters and calluses. Guards against friction and painful irritation from overlapping or rubbing toes. Tubes are capped to offer full protection in typically hard to cover areas. Absorbs shock and pressure better than less effective drugstore foam products that quickly wear out.

The post Gel Lined Digital Finger & Toe Caps appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Tubing may be cut-to-size for a custom fit. Dermatologically tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. Can also be used to protect sore or tender spots on the finger. Use the 35 mm with the big toes or thumbs.

  • Elastic sleeve hugs the digit and stays put, so you can wear it in any shoe, closed or open toe, and also when barefoot
  • Silicone gel cushioning helps prevent blistering and helps to relieve hot spots, such as painful warts, hard or soft corns
  • Molds to the skin, insulating the sensitive area against shock and pressure
  • Capped design allows for total protection, even in tough places
  • Three sizes- 20 mm, 25 mm and 35 mm. 25 mm is suitable for most fingers and 20 mm for toes
  • Durable, washable (by hand) and reusable

The post Gel Lined Digital Finger & Toe Caps appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Digital Strip | Half Coat
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Soft, comfortable, stretchable fabric tubing that is lined with a moisturizing gel pad that comforts and cushions sensitive corns and calluses. Can also be used to protect sore or tender spots on the finger. Absorbs shock and pressure better than less effective drugstore foam products that quickly wear out.

The post Gel Digital Strip | Half Coat appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Tubing is cut-to-size for a custom fit – must be trimmed to meet individual sizing needs. Dermatologically tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. Two sizes- 20 mm and 35 mm. 20 mm is suitable for most fingers and toes. Use the 35 mm with the great toes or thumbs.

  • Guards against friction and painful irritation from overlapping or rubbing toes.
  • Elastic sleeve hugs the digit and stays put, so you can wear it in any shoe, closed or open toe, and also when barefoot/
  • Silicone gel cushioning helps prevent blistering and helps to relieve hot spots, such as painful warts, hard or soft corns.
  • Molds to the skin, insulating the sensitive area against shock and pressure.
  • Durable, washable (by hand) and reusable.
  • Cut-to-fit for custom length.

The post Gel Digital Strip | Half Coat appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Elastic Bandage Wrap Hook Closures
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
BandAce Secure Fastener Clips Accessories for BandAce Elastic Bandage Wraps are essential for providing a properly secured bandage wrap. Have you ever found yourself unwrapping an injury at the end of the day, only to find the fasteners had fallen off over the day? If so, you know it's important to have plenty of fasteners on hand, especially if you're an athlete! Our metal and elastic Stretch Clips feature hook fasteners designed to stay put keep bandages firmly in place!

The post Elastic Bandage Wrap Hook Closures appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
We offer 25, 50 and 100 count BandAce fastener clips packs, so they’ll never go missing at the worst times. Use in combination with the AT Surgical BandAce elastic bandage wrap for optimal stability and joint protection.

The post Elastic Bandage Wrap Hook Closures appeared first on AT Surgical.
